</span>
</span> <!-- End Ezoic - Top Banner in Content  - top_of_page --></div> <!-- Easy Plugin for AdSense V8.67 --><p>At any given time all of us have cancer cells in our body. The key is that those active cancer cells don’t have an environment that fosters and supports their growth. That’s when cancer becomes a problem because these what are essentially dormant cancer cells come to life and replicate at an alarming rate. Cancer is the second leading cause of death in America, right behind heart disease.</p><p><span id='ezoic-pub-ad-placeholder-118' class="ezoic-adpicker-ad" data-ezadpicker="118" data-ez-position-type="under_first_paragraph"></span><span style='display:block !important;float:none;margin-bottom:20px !important;margin-left:0px !important;margin-right:0px !important;margin-top:20px !important;min-height:80px;min-width:468px;text-align:center !important;' class='ezoic-ad banner-1 adtester-container adtester-container-118'>
<span id='div-gpt-ad-healthywildandfree_com-banner-1-0' ezaw='468' ezah='60' style='position:relative;z-index:0;display:block;' class='ezoic-ad'>

<script data-cfasync='false' type='text/javascript' style='display:none;'>
eval(ez_write_tag([[468,60],'healthywildandfree_com-banner-1','ezslot_6']));
</script>
</span>
</span>Doctors and hospitals are right up there on that list too believe it or not. Hospitals and doctors are actually risky and dangerous according to new findings. People often go into the doctor or hospital for one reason and are misdiagnosed or mistreated and this has resulted in a few hundred thousand fatalities each year.<span id='ezoic-pub-ad-placeholder-109' class="ezoic-adpicker-ad" data-ezadpicker="109" data-ez-position-type="under_second_paragraph"></span><span style='display:block !important;float:none;margin-bottom:2px !important;margin-left:0px !important;margin-right:0px !important;margin-top:2px !important;min-height:420px;min-width:580px;text-align:center !important;' class='ezoic-ad netboard-2 adtester-container adtester-container-109'>
<span id='div-gpt-ad-healthywildandfree_com-netboard-2-0' ezaw='580' ezah='400' style='position:relative;z-index:0;display:block;' class='ezoic-ad'>

<script data-cfasync='false' type='text/javascript' style='display:none;'>
eval(ez_write_tag([[580,400],'healthywildandfree_com-netboard-2','ezslot_4']));
</script>
</span>
</span></p><p>One thing people often go into the medical system for is to check on skin abnormalities or moles that may be cancerous. To me, it’s crazy that people actually go in to check for skin cancer from a mole when they can do a few simple things at home to reduce that mole, whether it’s cancerous or not.<span id='ezoic-pub-ad-placeholder-119' class="ezoic-adpicker-ad" data-ezadpicker="119" data-ez-position-type="under_second_paragraph"></span></p><p>You can save yourself a lot of time, money, stress and worry by simply following the idea in this article.</p><p>There is a simple recipe known as Indian Black Salve that is an excellent way to treat moles, skin tags and even skin cancer.</p><p>One of the main key ingredients in this Indian Black Salve is bloodroot. Bloodroot is an herb native to Canada and the United States. It has been used to treat everything from warts, to moles, skin tags, cherry angiomas, and even skin cancer.  Bloodroot is also effective internally as a treatment for breast, ovarian, bladder, and other cancers even including bone cancer.</p><h3 style="text-align: center;"><em><strong>How To Make Indian Black Salve </strong></em><span id='ezoic-pub-ad-placeholder-123' class="ezoic-adpicker-ad" data-ezadpicker="123" data-ez-position-type="under_second_paragraph"></span></h3><h3>What You’ll Need:</h3><ul><li><a href="http://amzn.to/2e5QqGP">Pau D’arco</a></li><li><a href="http://amzn.to/2f5QeJT">Burdock Root</a></li><li><a href="http://amzn.to/2fxesQs">Yarrow</a></li><li><a href="http://amzn.to/2eUlJWL">Yellow Dock</a></li><li><a href="http://amzn.to/2e5QPZR">Prickly Ash Bark</a></li><li><a href="http://amzn.to/2dVybZE">Calendula flowers</a></li><li><a href="http://amzn.to/2f5Ml7z">Bloodroot</a></li><li><a href="http://amzn.to/2eUqtM4">Sarsaparilla</a></li><li><a href="http://amzn.to/2fa1YKc">10% Bentonite clay</a></li><li><a href="http://amzn.to/2fa0y2a">Activated Charcoal</a></li><li><a href="http://amzn.to/2e5LuBR">2% DMSO</a></li></ul><!-- Easy Plugin for AdSense V8.67 --> <!-- [midtext: 1 urCount: 1 urMax: 0] --><div class="ezAdsense adsense adsense-midtext" style="text-align:center;margin:12px;"><!-- Ezoic - Mid Banner Ad - mid_content --><span id='ezoic-pub-ad-placeholder-102'></span><span style='display:inline-block;float:none;margin-bottom:2px !important;margin-left:0px !important;margin-right:0px !important;margin-top:2px !important;min-height:300px;min-width:336px;' class='ezoic-ad box-1 adtester-container adtester-container-102'>
<span id='div-gpt-ad-healthywildandfree_com-box-1-0' ezaw='336' ezah='280' style='position:relative;z-index:0;display:block;' class='ezoic-ad'>

<script data-cfasync='false' type='text/javascript' style='display:none;'>
eval(ez_write_tag([[336,280],'healthywildandfree_com-box-1','ezslot_1']));
</script>
</span>
</span> <!-- End Ezoic - Mid Banner Ad - mid_content --></div> <!-- Easy Plugin for AdSense V8.67 --><p>Each of these links above is clickable to the individual root, bark, clay or herb needed. It’s important to note that there are multiple Indian Black Salve recipes. This is just one of them, specifically for skin tags, moles or cancerous skin in general.</p><h3>How To Prepare:</h3><ol><li>Use equal parts of Pau D’arco, Burdock Root, Yarrow, Yellow Dock, Prickly Ash Bark, Calendula flower, Sarsaparilla, in a small glass jar. 4-drops of each of these works fine. This will be 28-drops of these together in a small glass jar.</li><li>Then, add 7 drops Bloodroot.</li><li>Next, add a few pinches of Bentonite clay and Activated Charcoal each.</li><li>Next, add the 2% DMSO cream, As much of the the DMSO cream is required to make it the consistency you like.</li><li>Mix these liquids, powders and cream with your pointer finger and thumb. Keep mixing until it turns into a paste consistency. You can always add more herbs, clay, charcoal or cream to thicken or liquify as needed to create a paste to your liking, whether thinner or thicker. The ingredients are still there, mixed and working together and that’s what counts.</li></ol><p>This should turn out as a black paste. The activated charcoal is what turns it into this paste. You can apply this to your skin tags, moles or skin cancer and leave on until it dries. I recommend leaving this on these part of your skin until you shower next. This could be an hour or 3 hours. When done simply wash off with warm water in the shower or bath.</p><p>You can use the Indian Black Salve daily if you’d like. If you want you can make a larger batch and store in a glass container or jar in your fridge for daily use. You can also add coconut oil additionally to spread it out and to allow the herbs and oils to penetrate your skin deeper.</p><p>Additional ingredients you could add are <a href="http://amzn.to/2efOa31">Organic Moringa Oil (found here)</a> which many people have used to successfully treat skin cancer. You can also use <a href="http://amzn.to/2efK9f3">liquid graviola extract (an herb from the amazon rainforest) </a>specifically for moles and skin cancer as well.</p><p>Good luck with the Indian Black Salve paste!<br> (I have recently gotten a lot of people asking if you can get this ready-made. I did find only one company that produces a bloodroot salve with DMSO and a few other of the ingredients listed. You can find that product on amazon here:  <a href="http://amzn.to/2fdXUbO">http://amzn.to/2fdXUbO</a></p><div class="" data-block="true" data-editor="ddhbi" data-offset-key="7jk8d-0-0"><div class="_1mf _1mj" data-offset-key="7jk8d-0-0"><span data-offset-key="7jk8d-0-0"><span data-text="true">I recommend to be very cautious and using it in very small amounts to start. This is a strong salve as you can imagine that it heals skin cancer and eats away at moles and skin tags. Use in small quantities and increase slightly as you feel comfortable. </span></span></div></div><p>P.S. I found this guy named Bill O’Leary on Pinterest who successfully used the Indian Black Salve Recipe to heal skin cancer on his nose. You can see his before and after pictures below… Please note, Bill had skin cancer on his nose so he used quite a bit of this salve. You only need a very small dab for moles and skin tags. Just enough to cover the mole or skin tag and that’s it… About the size of a pin head.</p><p><img class="lazy lazy-hidden aligncenter wp-image-7468 size-large" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODdhAQABAPAAAP///wAAACwAAAAAAQABAEACAkQBADs=" data-lazy-type="image" data-lazy-src="http://healthywildandfree.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/10/Bill-OLeary-Used-Indian-Black-Salve-Paste-To-Heal-His-Skin-Cancer...-683x1024.png" alt="bill-oleary-used-indian-black-salve-paste-to-heal-his-skin-cancer" width="683" height="1024" data-lazy-srcset="http://healthywildandfree.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/10/Bill-OLeary-Used-Indian-Black-Salve-Paste-To-Heal-His-Skin-Cancer...-683x1024.png 683w, http://healthywildandfree.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/10/Bill-OLeary-Used-Indian-Black-Salve-Paste-To-Heal-His-Skin-Cancer...-200x300.png 200w, http://healthywildandfree.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/10/Bill-OLeary-Used-Indian-Black-Salve-Paste-To-Heal-His-Skin-Cancer....png 735w" sizes="(max-width: 683px) 100vw, 683px"><noscript><img class="aligncenter wp-image-7468 size-large" src="http://healthywildandfree.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/10/Bill-OLeary-Used-Indian-Black-Salve-Paste-To-Heal-His-Skin-Cancer...-683x1024.png" alt="bill-oleary-used-indian-black-salve-paste-to-heal-his-skin-cancer" width="683" height="1024" srcset="http://healthywildandfree.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/10/Bill-OLeary-Used-Indian-Black-Salve-Paste-To-Heal-His-Skin-Cancer...-683x1024.png 683w, http://healthywildandfree.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/10/Bill-OLeary-Used-Indian-Black-Salve-Paste-To-Heal-His-Skin-Cancer...-200x300.png 200w, http://healthywildandfree.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/10/Bill-OLeary-Used-Indian-Black-Salve-Paste-To-Heal-His-Skin-Cancer....png 735w" sizes="(max-width: 683px) 100vw, 683px" /></noscript></p><!-- Easy Plugin for AdSense V8.67 --> <!-- [leadout: 2 urCount: 2 urMax: 0] --><div class="ezAdsense adsense adsense-leadout" style="text-align:center;margin:12px;"><!-- Ezoic -
